sentences: Sergio Cammariere (born November 15, 1960 in Crotone, Italy) is an Italian jazz singer-songwriter.

After a long career as a niche musician distinguished by his collaboration with the poet and singer-songwriter Roberto Kunstler, in 2003 he appeared at the Sanremo Festival performing the song Tutto quello che un uomo.
2003 – Dalla pace del mare lontano (Second version, including the track Tutto quello che un uomo – Sanremo 2003)
